game.name: Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A nostalgic JRPG love letter to the Game Boy Color era! Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land is a lighthearted adventure with challenging turn-based combat. Explore a mysterious world, take on tough opponents, and save the day in a game designed to charm all ages!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A nostalgic JRPG love letter to the Game Boy Color era! Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land is a lighthearted adventure with challenging turn-based combat. Explore a mysterious world, take on tough opponents, and save the day in a game designed to charm all ages!
